title: Red Receives the Letter and Sets Off
summary: Scarlett (Little Red Riding Hood) receives a letter from her sick grandmother asking for company. Scarlett’s mother instructs her to deliver a basket of food and warns her to avoid the woods. Scarlett, motivated by concern for her grandmother and curiosity about the forbidden path, decides to take the shortcut through the woods.

title: Scarlett Encounters the Mysterious Stranger
summary: While hurrying along the shortcut, Scarlett is stopped by a charming woodsman named Lucian who warns her about wolves in the area. Lucian offers to escort her but Scarlett, wary yet intrigued by his intensity, refuses and continues alone. Lucian’s lingering gaze and cryptic words plant seeds of doubt and fascination in Scarlett.

title: The Wolf’s Deception at Grandmother’s Cottage
summary: The cunning wolf, Viktor, arrives at Grandmother’s cottage ahead of Scarlett and locks Grandmother in a closet. Viktor disguises himself as Grandmother, hoping to lure Scarlett for his own mysterious reasons. Viktor rehearses his lines and prepares the cottage to deceive Scarlett upon her arrival.

title: Scarlett’s Suspicion and Lucian’s Return
summary: Scarlett arrives at the cottage and immediately notices oddities in 'Grandmother’s' behavior and appearance. She questions Viktor, who tries to maintain his disguise. Just as Viktor attempts to lure her closer, Lucian bursts in, having followed Scarlett out of concern, forcing Viktor to reveal himself and sparking a tense confrontation.

title: The Confrontation and a Surprising Confession
summary: Lucian and Viktor clash in a physical struggle while Scarlett frees her real grandmother from the closet. During the fight, Viktor confesses he was once human and cursed to be a wolf, seeking true love to break the spell. Scarlett and Lucian must decide whether to trust Viktor or drive him away.

title: Scarlett’s Choice and the Spell’s Breaking
summary: Moved by Viktor’s confession and sensing his sincerity, Scarlett chooses to show compassion and kisses Viktor, breaking his curse. Lucian, heartbroken but respectful, leaves the cottage, while Viktor transforms back into a man. Scarlett and Viktor admit their feelings, and Grandmother thanks Scarlett for her bravery and compassion.
